SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT t1.f_mater_code, t3.f_orign_method, (case when t3.f_orign_method=1 THEN IFNULL(t6.f_total_count,0)-IFNULL(t6.f_lock_stock,0) ELSE IFNULL(t6.f_total_count,0)-IFNULL(t6.f_lock_stock,0)+IFNULL(t1.f_quality_box,0) END )AS usableQuality, t1.*, (case when t1.f_cigtype=0 THEN (select f_conver_coef from t_base_materialinfo tt1 LEFT JOIN t_mater_packspec tt2 on tt1.f_packagestandards=tt2.f_data_id where tt1.f_mater_code=t1.f_mater_code) ELSE (select f_conver_coef from t_base_testcigarette tt3 LEFT JOIN t_mater_packspec tt4 on tt3.f_packagestandards=tt4.f_data_id where tt3.f_code=t1.f_mater_code) END) as converCoef FROM t_ware_outorderdetail t1 LEFT JOIN t_ware_outmainorder t3 ON t1.f_mainorder_id = t3.f_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_inventorymain t6 ON t6.f_mater_code = t1.f_mater_code AND t6.f_subver_id = t1.f_subver_id WHERE t1.f_mainorder_id = #{mainorderId}
SELECT SUM(a.f_quality_box) FROM t_ware_outorderdetail a WHERE a.f_mainorder_id = #{mainorderId} GROUP BY a.f_mainorder_id
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_outorderdetail SET f_is_delete = 1 WHERE f_mainorder_id = #{mainorderId}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.f_mater_code, t1.f_mater_name, t1.f_cigtype, t1.f_mater_version, t1.f_mater_cigbrand, t1.f_subver_name, SUM(t1.f_quality_box) AS f_quality_box FROM t_ware_outorderdetail t1 LEFT JOIN t_ware_outmainorder t2 ON t1.f_mainorder_id = t2.f_id WHERE substring(Convert(char(10),t2.f_created_date ,112),1,8)=#{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND t2.f_is_delete = 0 AND t2.f_status = 3 GROUP BY t1.f_mater_code, t1.f_subver_id
